com.ibm.team.build.ant.task

Class AbstractTeamBuildTask.FileAntAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.team.build.ant.task.AbstractTeamBuildTask.AntAttribute
      • com.ibm.team.build.ant.task.AbstractTeamBuildTask.FileAntAttribute
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractTeamBuildTask

    protected static class AbstractTeamBuildTask.FileAntAttribute
extends AbstractTeamBuildTask.AntAttribute
    Helper class used to wrap the File attributes that are passed to the Ant task in the Ant build script.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileAntAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName, java.io.File attributeValue, boolean attributeRequired, boolean fileMustExist)
      Constructs a FileAntAttribute converting the fully qualified path representing the file attribute into a String.
      FileAntAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName, java.io.File attributeValue, boolean attributeRequired, boolean fileMustExist, boolean pathNotDirectory)
      Constructs a FileAntAttribute converting the fully qualified path representing the file attribute into a String.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void validate()
      Validates that that a required attribute is not null or that any attribute is not empty when trimmed of all whitespace.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileAntAttribute

        public FileAntAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName,
                        java.io.File attributeValue,
                        boolean attributeRequired,
                        boolean fileMustExist)
        Constructs a FileAntAttribute converting the fully qualified path representing the file attribute into a String.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute for the Ant task
        attributeValue - the value of the attribute for the Ant task
        attributeRequired - indicates if the attribute is required for the Ant task
        fileMustExist - indicates if the file must exist to be considered valid.

      • FileAntAttribute

        public FileAntAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName,
                        java.io.File attributeValue,
                        boolean attributeRequired,
                        boolean fileMustExist,
                        boolean pathNotDirectory)
        Constructs a FileAntAttribute converting the fully qualified path representing the file attribute into a String.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute for the Ant task
        attributeValue - the value of the attribute for the Ant task
        attributeRequired - indicates if the attribute is required for the Ant task
        fileMustExist - indicates if the file must exist to be considered valid.
        pathNotDirectory - indicates if the specified file must exist and should point to a valid file and not a directory.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public void validate()
              throws AbstractTeamBuildTask.IllegalAntAttributeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractTeamBuildTask.AntAttribute
        Validates that that a required attribute is not null or that any attribute is not empty when trimmed of all whitespace. This method can be overridden if the derived client needs more or less stringent validity checking.
        Overrides:
        validate in class AbstractTeamBuildTask.AntAttribute
        Throws:
        AbstractTeamBuildTask.IllegalAntAttributeException - if a required attribute is not null or that any attribute is not empty when trimmed of all whitespace.
